channel.title: Red Carnations on a Black Grave
channel.description:
*For my 6-year Gauntletversary…*
Red Carnations on a Black Grave is a freeform roleplaying game that brings to life the 72 tumultuous days of the Paris Commune. Each player portrays two characters during the two months of the Commune, one of whom must die during the French Army’s all-out assault on Paris in the last week of May, 1871. Special cards guide your play, providing questions about how the characters are related to each other, historical incidents to serve as the basis of scenes in the game, and the ultimate fate of your surviving characters.
![RedCarnations|640x486](upload://oiW1PhzP77FIMke5cuVrR9GpBW0.jpeg)
**Content Warning:** oppression, violence, character death **Duration**: A single 4 hour session **Breaks**: 2 breaks (5-10 mins each) or as required **Venue**: GM’s Zoom **Recording**: Yes, but made public only with all players' enthusiastic consent! **Attendance**: One-Shot **Safety:** Lines & Veils, Script Change, and Open Door Policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.
[Sign up](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Mur1heGpbMWr8CvpvEu) [date=2022-04-09 time=09:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-04-09 time=13:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]
I will send links and further information in an email one week before the game. Please check your SPAM folders if you don't see anything from me.
RSVPs open to all on February 3rd at 10pm GMT
